page.title: 09GAMES-LYDBROOK SCHOOL 1985
page.content: Our favourite games at school are Cabbages,Polo,Free Denno, Quick Jack and Eggy Peggy. {Tag One person is chosen to chase the other people.When she succeeds in touching one of the other players,the game is repeated, with the person who was touched chasing the others. {Cabbages} This game is a bit like tag.Each person starts off with ten lives.One person has to try and touch the other people.If the person who has to touch comes near then you shout "Cabbages", and sit down.You then lose one life. The game finishes when a person is caught standing up or when somebody loses all their lives.
